column4: I'm having problems with my connection. Under Vista, everything seems to work fine. Under Ubuntu (8.10), normal surfing works fine, but when I try to do interactive stuff (gmail, facebook, banking, posting forum messages) things don't work properly. It takes ages to submit form and then nothing happens, etc. I've talked to my ISP and he said they're not doing anything special and that if it works under Vista it should work on Ubuntu. So what
what web browser are you using, and do you have any extensions that can cause this behaviour?
Firefox. I have the 0.8 gnome enhancement extension, but disabling it doesn't seem to make any difference
